refnamediv.refpurpose: A graphical toolkit for database developers and administrators

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the program tora.
This manual page was written for the &debian; distribution because the original program does not have a manual page.

Tora is a graphical toolkit for database developers and administrators. It features a schema browser, SQL worksheet, PL/SQL editor and debugger, storage manager, rollback segment monitor, instance manager, and SQL output viewer. Via QT3 it can access PostgreSQL and MySQL directly. Any other database systems can be accessed via ODBC.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: tora has an integrated online help system.
